Dear all,

I try to evolve a time series predictor where the input and outp=
ut 
sensors have specific and meaningful positions in a Cartesian x,y,z 
sp=
ace.

As I understand it; the substrate generates a hypercube like 
phenoty=
pe network that is applied to the problem.

In my case I will have an input=
 cube of 8x8x8 input sensors and 1

My question is if the=
 phenotype generated can be recurrent. The

ecurrent network outperforms ordinary
